moduleMetadataJson.name: BusyBox DNS Configuration
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will be applied on a session connected to a BusyBox shell. It allows
        to set the DNS server on the device executing BusyBox so it will be sent by the
        DHCP server to network hosts.
author: Javier Vicente Vallejo

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
